metadata.title: 5398-1 -- Simple DirectMedia Layer vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5398-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3ubuntu0.1 libsdl2-doc - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3ubuntu0.1 libsdl2-dev - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
